Running to God

A Journey of Faith Through the Australian Outback

From Perth to Port Lincoln — discover what it means to stop running from yourself and start running toward Jesus.

Start the JourneyLearn More

The Road Trip That Changed Everything

In 2024, I drove from Perth to Port Lincoln across the Nullarbor Plain — one of the most remote stretches of road on Earth. Along the way, through desert silence and ocean vastness, I discovered what it truly means to run toward God.

The Desert

Finding God in the vast emptiness of the Nullarbor — where silence speaks louder than words.

The Ocean

The Great Australian Bight — standing at the edge of the world, glimpsing eternity.

The Camps

Bush tucker, campfires under billion-star skies, and conversations with fellow travelers.

The People

Roadhouse encounters and stranger-friends who became part of the story.

Resources for Your Journey

Whether you're just beginning or deep in your walk with Jesus, we have something for you.

Campfire Devotions

Evening devotionals inspired by nights under the stars. Gather around the fire and meet with God.

Explore

The Journey

Follow each stop along the Perth to Port Lincoln road trip and the spiritual lessons learned.

Explore

Bible Studies

Deep dives into Scripture focused on our relationship with Jesus, the Son of God.

Ready to Start Running?

The road is long, but you don't have to walk it alone. Jesus is waiting with open arms. Take the first step today.
